title: Tetrahemihexahedron
summary: In geometry, the tetrahemihexahedron or hemicuboctahedron is a uniform star polyhedron, indexed as U4. It has 7 faces (4 triangles and 3 squares), 12 edges, and 6 vertices.[1] Its vertex figure is a crossed quadrilateral.
